I changed SWT error to InvalidArgumentException since SWT error was too 
severe. Still, I am puzzled - there is a character coming from the search hit 
summary that is invalid but I cannot find it exactly. THe source file contains 
  at that position.

Found the reason - the indexed was letting '&nsbp;' go through as a summary of 
the hit. After replacing character with a value 160 ( ) with a regular 
space. 

In addition, one of the text titles had a & that was not escaped. After 
escaping hit titles, I got 'hello' to work.
